availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born in 1808 in Kentucky. Blacksmith. Married to Matilda Hall Webb. Father of Mary Webb, Sarah Webb, Elizabeth Webb, Rose F. Webb, and John Webb. Blacksmith in Nelson County in 1850. Blacksmith in Nelson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District No. 2.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District No. 1, p. 40.
Find A Grave, "Leo Webb (c1809-c1887)," Memorial #110102113, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/110102113 (accessed February 12, 2019).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Washington County Marriages, Film #000241382, p. 525.
